DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Phase IV , Surveillance Registry Study Evaluate Safety DEFINITY® Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Patients , investigator 's opinion , require DEFINITY® echocardiography due suboptimal , unenhanced image . Exclusion criterion Known hypersensitivity perflutren , DEFINITY® , echo contrast agent . Prior SAE associate perflutren , DEFINITY® , administration echo contrast agent .
